text: Suhani Dhanki is an Indian dancer and television actress. Suhani is best known for her portrayal of Madri in Mahabharat on Star Plus. She played the role of a pirate princess, Laachi, in Swastik Productions' Porus. In 2017, she married Prathmesh Mody. ==Television== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Show !
